availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Maria Walker McNeily in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on March 26, 1833. Father of Samuel J. McNeily, Maria L. McNeily, John N. McNeily, Caroline W. McNeily, Jane McNeily, Martha McNeily, Orlena McNeily, and Elvira McNeily. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 342A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 89.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 36.
